sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Hypodermic Syringes and Needles Act.

sections.heading: Possession of hypodermic syringes and needles.
sections.text: Possession of hypodermic syringes and needles.

sections.heading: Sale of hypodermic syringes and needles.
sections.text: Sale of hypodermic syringes and needles.

sections.heading: Penalty.
sections.text:
A person who violates any provision of
Section 1 or 2 of this Act
is guilty of a Class A misdemeanor for the first such offense;
and a Class 4 felony for a
second or any succeeding offense.

sections.heading: Any prosecution under this Act may be commenced by an information as
sections.text: defined in Section 102-12 of the Code of Criminal Procedure of 1963.
